ComicInfo.Summary: One word: RIPCLAW That's right! CYBERFORCE'S favorite Native American Indian has tracked Jackie Estacado right through his cover in the Witness Protection Program (where Jackie is assigned while waiting to testify at Uncle Frankie's coming trial) here in Miami. But don't think Robert Bearclaw intends to use his cybernetic implants to simply kill The Darkness -- he's got bigger plans in store! In fact, so big are these plans, they can't be contained in one story! This issue begins a five part story arc that will help pave the way not only for the future of this book -- but also the future relaunch of the book that started TOP COW COMICS! Any guesses?
ComicInfo.Tags: Jackie Estacado,Jenny Romano,Wenders,Darklings,The Franchetti Family,Frankie Franchetti,Ripclaw,Sonatine
ComicInfo.Title: Ripclaw (Part One)
